Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Arzachena (Baja Sardinia), Club Village Forte Cappellini is convenient to Aquadream and Tanca Manna Beach. This beach hotel is within the vicinity of Gregoland and Stella Maris Church.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 50 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers. Housekeeping is provided daily, and both cribs/infant beds (surcharge) and rollaway/extra beds are available on request.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Head down to the water and enjoy a day at the private beach, or take advantage of other recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features babysitting/childcare (surcharge) and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Club Village Forte Cappellini. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.
